title: Professional Cloud DevOps Engineer Path
description: This learning path helps you advance your skills in site reliability engineering, CI/CD pipelines, and service management on Google Cloud.

title: Create and Manage Cloud Resources
description: Get hands-on practice with the foundational components of Google Cloud, including projects, IAM, networking, and Compute Engine.

title: Perform Foundational Infrastructure Tasks
description: This is the introductory quest for those new to Google Cloud, providing hands-on practice with the most common services.

title: Set up and Configure a Cloud Environment
description: Learn how to configure a cloud environment using the Google Cloud console and gcloud command-line tool, including projects and billing.

title: Automating Infrastructure with Terraform
description: Learn to use Terraform, the popular Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tool, to provision and manage Google Cloud resources efficiently and repeatably.

title: Build and Secure Networks in Google Cloud
description: Explore Google Cloud's networking capabilities, from VPCs and subnets to firewalls and load balancing. A core skill for any cloud professional.

title: Ensure Access and Identity in Google Cloud
description: Master Identity and Access Management (IAM) in Google Cloud. Learn about roles, permissions, and service accounts to secure your cloud environment.

title: Getting Started with Google Kubernetes Engine
description: Learn the fundamentals of GKE, including creating clusters, deploying containerized applications, and managing workloads with kubectl and Google Cloud Console.

title: Architecting with Google Compute Engine
description: Learn to design and deploy robust, scalable, and highly available solutions on Google Compute Engine, from VMs to load balancing.

title: Manage Kubernetes in Google Cloud
description: Dive deeper into managing GKE clusters. This course covers monitoring, logging, and managing applications in a production environment.

title: Getting Started with Cloud Storage
description: Learn the fundamentals of Google Cloud Storage, including creating buckets, uploading objects, and managing access control.

title: Serverless Cloud Run Development
description: Learn how to deploy and manage serverless applications on Google Cloud Run, a fully managed compute platform.

title: Introduction to Generative AI
description: A foundational course covering the basics of what Generative AI is, how it is used, and how it differs from traditional machine learning methods.

title: Introduction to Large Language Models
description: Explore the fundamentals of Large Language Models (LLMs), their use cases, and how you can tune them for your specific needs.

title: Build Apps with Google Workspace APIs
description: Learn to use Google Workspace APIs to build applications that integrate with services like Gmail, Drive, Calendar, and Sheets.
